summary: Implements a graph convolutional neural network tailored for EEG data, treating each electrode as a graph node with a fixed set of features and applying graph convolutions to capture spatial relationships across the electrode layout.
business_intent: Provide a ready-to-use deep learning model for EEG analysis tasks—such as brain‑computer interface control, seizure detection, or mental‑state classification—by leveraging graph‑based representations of electrode connectivity.
